name: crackle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make a lot of short, dry, sharp sounds: The radio started to crackle. The logs crackled and popped in the fireplace.

a short, dry, sharp sound: the crackle of burning logs

to make a set of short, sharp sounds: The fire spread to an evergreen tree, which crackled with flames. crackle noun [ C ] us
